tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
tokens.translation: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.translation: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)
tokens.translation: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)

tokens.resolved_gloss: (as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around
tokens.translation: (as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around

tokens.resolved_gloss: a (metallic) sheet (as pounded thin); also a spring net (as spread out like a lamina)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to tremble inwardly (or palpitate), i.e. (figuratively) be (causative, make) (suddenly) alarmed or agitated; by implication to hasten anxiously

tokens.resolved_gloss: a (sudden) alarm (properly, the object feared, by implication, the feeling)
